The 1Â½ mile long trail is considered easy and is mostly 
flat with some short ups and downs.  It takes 45 minutes to an hour to hike the trail. An Adventure Pass is required to park at the Woodland Trail trailhead.

tags.description: Section where climb along rock face (with ropes as of May 2023) required to avoid fording river. Sac_scale is an estimate to indicate that it's difficult.

A path that may not lead to the peak. The wrong path is marked so that people can choose the correct path when they decide in the three-way intersection. The correct path should be safer. The wrong path is damper with lizards and snakes on the sides.
